options.name: Monster Bane
options.description: Gain a 1d4 Bonus to Defense Checks against Monsters and Beasts.

options.name: Fearless Hunter
options.description: Gain Immunity to the Afraid Condition

options.name: Action : Devastate
options.description: If you have Moved at least 4 Units on a turn, you can make a Melee Attack dealing bonus Damage equal to the distance in Units you moved. If the Target is a Monster or Beast, this bonus is doubled.

options.name: Increased Potency
options.description: Gain +1 Spell Damage and Gain +1 Damage with Melee Attacks

options.name: Monster Tamer
options.description: You can Tame a Monster as a Pet within the Level of the Pet Taming Formula using your Persuasion Skill instead of your Animals Skill.

options.name: Action : Monster Harvest
options.description: You make an Attack with a Spell or Weapon. If this Attack brings a Creature to 8 or less Health, the Monster is executed. You gain Permanent Temporary Heath that recharges after each Full Rest equal to the Level of the Monster you killed. Other effects that grant Temporary Health no longer work on you.
